DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect whether urgent elective cesarean section occurrance chronic pain .
DOC.brief_title: The Chronic Pain Incidence After Elective Urgent Cesarean Sections
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine effect whether urgent elective cesarean section occurrance chronic pain . Patients age 18 - 45 year whose underwent urgent elective cesarean section invite participate study . Preoperatively operate theatre , patient ask complete pain catastrophizing scale ( PCS ) questionnaire . In postoperative 6 month discharge , patient call investigator blind study evaluate presence chronic pain . Patients ask grade pain suffer use numeric rating scale intensity pain .
DOC.criteria: Female 18 45 year age underwent elective urgent cesarean section willing participate study reach phone use antipsychotic antidepressant drug
